actors.name: Find a friend
actors.text: Find a friend or two and ask for their help.

actors.name: Tell a trusted
actors.text: Tell a trusted adult that you need help.

actors.name: Tattling_exp
actors.text:
Going to an adult to try and get someone in
trouble over something that's not very important

actors.name: Telling_exp
actors.text:
Talking to an adult about a serious situation
where someone could get hurt

actors.name: list1item2
actors.text:
Someone who works
in the office

actors.name: What if no one is around
actors.text: What if no one is around to help?

actors.name: decorative_text
actors.text:
"I don't like it when you do that
and I want you to stop."

actors.name: listItem2
actors.text:
Ask the person being bullied to
play with you and your friends.

actors.name: listItem3
actors.text: Find a trusted adult to help.

actors.name: teacher
actors.text: Teachers: follow up on this lesson with offline activities found in your Act Now! Teacher's Guide.

actors.text: You have already completed part of this lesson
